As far as shooting games go, this one is a cut above the rest in its mechanics due to the immense precision and reflex required. Cooperation is imperative as tactics are the name of the game. Running and gunning will get you nowhere, and if you want some casual fun, you're probably better off playing something like Call of Duty (With no offence to those that prefer that playstyle). That said, the community is one of the absolute worst that I've ever seen, and you probably want to mute like 90% of the playerbase of antisocial teenagers and manchildren. 9/10

This is a fast review from me, note that this is my opinion

This game used to be fun to play but the cheaters and the toxic community ruined it. back in the days this game is really great and much better than these days,but after all the updates,removing bots,made the game free, ect.. this game is becoming worse and horrible,the matchmaking system is fkin trash,i barely found a cheater back then,now i've never found a game without a single cheaters even on deathmatch and casual,         there's no more fun in this game unless you play it with a friend.

if you want get kicked for nothing - play this game competitive
if you want to  learn new rascist words, toxic behavior - play this game competitive
if you want to learn russian for free? - play this game competitive
